extendedInfo.description: At St. Rose Dominican Hospitals - Every Patient Matters â especially or littlest bundles of joy! Our FREE Baby Growth App places information about your babyâs growth and breastfeeding tips and tricks at your fingertips. And if your baby stays in our NICU, this app can help answer your questions about your babyâs growth and development.Features:Tours and Videos:  Take a virtual tour of our NICU to see where we care for our littlest babies. Watch videos about breastfeeding to find helpful tips on latch and hand expressing. Not breastfeeding? Watch our video on formula safety.  Track My Baby: Learn what to expect from your baby as they grow. Our tool allows you to log your babyâs growth - starting at 23 weeks for micro preemies to full term - and can help you monitor height, weight and head circumference from date of birth through first year of life.Feeding My Baby:  Whether you are breast or bottle feeding, you can time and track your baby's feedings using our feeding log.Spiritual Care: We You and your family are going through a time of new beginnings! Weâre here for you every step of the way, and hope these inspirational quotes offer guidance and comfort.Follow Up Care: Find a pediatrician or specialist that meets your familyâs needs with a tap of a button!Find My Hospital: Get directions to the hospital nearest you.

reviews.title: St. Rose Rocks!
reviews.comment: Love the App!  Amazing Information for NICU parents and for any mom with a new baby.  The breastfeeding videos are very well done and I only wish I could have seen them with my first baby!  Learned some new stuff about fixing powdered formula.  Well done St.Rose Hospital!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: This is a very nice app!  It\'s easy to navigate, has an eye-catching and eye-appealing design, and best of all it is FREE!  Kudos, St. Rose... Well done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t add baby
reviews.comment: The add baby feature won\'t let me input the year 2012 for my baby\'s birth year (she\'s 8 weeks). Going to have to find another app.
reviews.author: Rose Summers

reviews.title: Crashed
reviews.comment: Nicu csre akways freezes and stops un installed because that the only part I wanted
reviews.author: Shelby Brumfield

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Not good for babies born before 1/1/2013
reviews.author: Danilo Rodrigues

reviews.title: Wont let you put in last years date
reviews.comment: Wonderful app with great quality but it won\'t let me put in 2012. Going to find another app
reviews.author: Heather Garcia

reviews.title: Lots of good info!
reviews.comment: Every new mom should get this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
